---
category: news
title: "AI Machine Learning Predicts Alzheimer’s Disease Risk"
excerpt: "The AI machine learning model revealed that age ranks first among all features in the age 40+ group and that the genetic effects reflected in the polygenic risk scores become more important than age for individuals aged 65 and older for predicting Alzheimer’s disease."
